LIGHT_DESCRIPTION: Today is a new day. It's your day. You shape it. Sign in to start managing your projects.
FORGOT_PASSWORD_DESCRIPTION: Please enter your email and we will send an OTP code in the next step to reset your password.
PASSWORD_RESET_LINK_SENT: Password reset link sent. Please check your email.
OTP_DESCRIPTION: We have sent an OTP code to your email exa****gmail.com. Enter the code below.
PASSWORD_COMPLEXITY: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter, one number, and one special character.
CHECK_INPUTS: Please check your inputs and ensure OTP is 7 digits.
PASSWORD_RESET_SUCCESS: Password reset successful. You can now log in with your new password.
